name: Neon Stick - Game Jam Edition
description:
Neon Stick is my first game, and is a short agility and puzzle game I created for the  "Novice Summer Jam Series: One-Button Input" Game Jam on Itch.io. I hope you'll have fun playing this short and not very difficult game. Everything including the sound was made by SIMCITIZEN.

Edit: since this game actually won the Game Jam it was made for, I will make a more complete version of the game for the people who enjoyed it. Thanks to everybody who supported and rated this game!
